Items.Title: Oversight: Foster Care in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight: Foster Care in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a report on obtaining government-issued identification for youth
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Report on obtaining government-issued identification for youth.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a report on the educational continuity of children in foster care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Report on the educational continuity of children in foster care.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a five-year plan to address barriers to permanency
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Certain children who have spent the greatest length of time in foster care.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a foster care task force
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Foster care task force.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a report on permanency indicators
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Report on permanency indicators.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to information collected and reported about youth and foster care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Information collected and reported about youth and foster care.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to foster care experience surveys
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Surveys for youth in foster care regarding experiences with foster parents.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to high school graduation rates of youth in foster care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: High school graduation rates of youth in foster care.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign legislation that would increase the amount of housing subsidy from $300 to $600 per month, and extend the age eligibility from 21 to 24 for youth who have aged out of foster care
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increase the amount of housing subsidy from $300 to $600 per month, and to extend the age eligibility from 21 to 24 for youth who have aged out of foster care.
